headline: Can This $2 Billion AI Investment Help Nvidia’s Secret Portfolio From Collapsing?
summary: keypoints] Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) owns a growing portfolio of strategic equity investments in companies supporting the broader artificial intelligence (AI) ecosystem, which is not widely discussed among retail investors. This portfolio has expanded in recent years to focus on stakes in AI infrastructure providers such as CoreWeave (NASDAQ:CRWV), Nebius Group (NASDAQ:NBIS), and Applied Digital (NASDAQ:APLD) that ... Can This $2 Billion AI Investment Help Nvidia’s Secret Portfolio From Collapsing?
